SEARCH
Package camppkg

Class CampManager

java.lang.Object
camppkg.CampManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
iCampCommMember, iCampStaff, iCampStudent, Serializable
public class CampManager extends Object implements Serializable, iCampStaff, iCampStudent, iCampCommMember
Manages a list of Camps in the system. Implements Serializable for serialization and deserialization. iCampStaff, iCampStudent, iCampCommMember interfaces for each user type.
See Also:

      endDate - End Date
      registrationClosingDate - Registration closing date

      location - Location
      totalSlots - Total number of slots
      campCommitteeSlots - Number of CC Slots
      description - Description for camp

    • register

      public void register(String campID, String studentID, String roleID)
      Allow a student to register for a role in a camp. Student cannot register if they have already registered or if registeration period is over. Or if the camp clashes with one of the other camps they have already registered for.
      Specified by:
      register in interface iCampStudent
      Parameters:
      campID - ID of the target camp
      studentID - ID of the student registering
      roleID - ID of the desired role
